name: Spirits of Combination Village
description:
In this story adventure game, play as 25-year-old Heidi as she navigates adulthood. Help her foster relationships with those who are important to her while balancing work on top of that.

Combination Village, the home of Heidi and her friends, is a small village where many of the residents hold strong beliefs about the afterlife and what happens when people are reborn as spirits. Their village name comes from the idea that they'll combine with their soulmate in the afterlife once they've passed on.

This point-and-click visual novel is a heavy narrative experience, and the choices you make will determine different outcomes. Solve puzzles, make decisions, and adventure through this story-rich game.

I created this for the Indie Game Making Contest: Rebirth 2022. The entire game and all of its artwork were created in one month by Michelle Rakar.

The theme this year was "Rebirth", so I created a new story with mostly new characters that exist within the universe of my bigger story, The Nays.

Important Performance Notes

For the best experience and the performance I've thoroughly tested most, I recommend:

  • Play in Full Screen Mode. Press F4 to enter that mode or toggle it in the Options if you're playing the downloaded version.
